channel.title: VyreScape 728 [Re-Opened] [NEW server]
channel.description:
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[center][size=30pt][b]Welcome to VyreScape![/b][/size]
[size=20pt]The server you'll never forget![/size][/center]
[center][img]http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/images/forums.jpg[/img] [url=http://www.vyre-scape.tk/index.php][size=14pt]Forums[/size][/url] [b]|[/b] [img]http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/images/playnow.png[/img] [url=http://www.vyre-scape.tk/index.php?action=ezportal;sa=page;p=1][size=14pt]Play NOW![/size][/url] [b]| [/b] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/jfx7v4.png[/img] [url=http://205.196.121.7/ec68648q3uzg/hw2dzqnz0lqy6mr/Vyre.jar][size=14pt]Download(JAR)[/size][/url] [b] [size=12pt]or[/size] [/b] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/jfx7v4.png[/img] [url=http://199.91.152.218/r52tyrcbmr7g/omi2dzb2rx34g31/Vyre.rar][size=14pt]Download(RAR)[/size][/url][/center] [center][img]http://www.sevador.com/services/hiscores/sevador718/images/overall.png[/img] [url=http://vyre-711.no-ip.biz:8080/highscores][size=14pt]Highscores![/size][/url][/center]
[center][size=14pt][color=black]VyreScape can offer you a great gameplay experience which will also be a fantastic adventure for you!
From killing cows and goblins to slaying the mightiest of monsters like the Queen Black Dragon![/size]
[size=10pt][u][b]We offer you:[/b][/u][/size] All god wars bosses! Tormented demons! Corporeal beast! A perfected Nex! Queen and King black dragons! Fight cave with 63 waves! Fight kiln! Great and stable economy! No downtime! No lagg! Server uptime at 99,9%! Freaquent updates! Money pouch! Medium xp, achieving a 99 has never felt so good! No random messages! High quality, fullscreen! RuneSpan! Stealing creation! Pest control!
[size=11pt][b]Ever wanted to get an item, let's say a bronze dagger? And the shops didn't provide it to you? WELL NO MORE! Because our server has item spawning enabled! The best items (for example korasi, bandos, godswords) can not be spawned![/b][/size]
Enough with the text. Pictures: [IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w434/vichyi/HOME.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w434/vichyi/HOME2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w434/vichyi/RUNESPAN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w434/vichyi/RC.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w434/vichyi/QBD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w434/vichyi/QBD2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w434/vichyi/QBD3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w434/vichyi/FightPits.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w434/vichyi/FIGHTCAVEENTRANCE.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w434/vichyi/INFIGHTCAVES.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w434/vichyi/WAVE2INCAVES.png[/img]
[center][size=25pt][b] Vyre 728![/b][/size][/center]
My last server got closed down because it started to die out.... And i thought i would quit RSPS for a while.... BUT, My old players motivated me to make server, because they had no home one.... So i made this one just for them! We haven't really much advertised... But there are players online AT ALL TIMES! :) Also, the staff steam hasn't been sorted out, there are none at the moment.

item.title: VyreScape 728 [Re-Opened] [NEW server]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“vyre-scape, post:24, topic:457089”]Ruff comments :L

Bump.[/quote]

What is known as: Constructive Criticism, A Harsh Assessment of what is being presented, or as I like to put it. Opening your eyes to what needs to be done if you wish to be successful, and perhaps gain a very large Server Population. Is this not why you are here? Do you not wish to learn and advance?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

Soulcist:

I don’t agree with RSPS communities using IPB, that is something that I could never agree upon. IPB shouldn’t be used for such things, vBulletin, SMF, MYBB, PHPBB etc., are all ones that are fine for RSPS but not IPB.

I disagree i think it is an awesome neat forum software!

item.title: VyreScape 728 [Re-Opened] [NEW server]
item.dc:creator: @vyre-scape vyre-scape
item.description:
@vyre-scape wrote:

[center][size=30pt]Welcome to VyreScape![/size]

[size=20pt]The server you’ll never forget![/size][/center]

[center] [size=14pt]Forums[/size] | [size=14pt]Play NOW![/size] | [size=14pt]Download(JAR)[/size] [size=12pt]or[/size] [size=14pt]Download(RAR)[/size][/center]
[center] [size=14pt]Highscores![/size][/center]

[center][size=14pt][color=black]VyreScape can offer you a great gameplay experience which will also be a fantastic adventure for you!

From killing cows and goblins to slaying the mightiest of monsters like the Queen Black Dragon![/size]

[size=10pt]We offer you:[/size]
All god wars bosses!
Tormented demons!
Corporeal beast!
A perfected Nex!
Queen and King black dragons!
Fight cave with 63 waves!
Fight kiln!
Great and stable economy!
No downtime!
No lagg!
Server uptime at 99,9%!
Freaquent updates!
Money pouch!
Medium xp, achieving a 99 has never felt so good!
No random messages!
High quality, fullscreen!
RuneSpan!
Stealing creation!
Pest control!

[size=11pt]Ever wanted to get an item, let’s say a bronze dagger? And the shops didn’t provide it to you? WELL NO MORE! Because our server has item spawning enabled! The best items (for example korasi, bandos, godswords) can not be spawned![/size]

Enough with the text. Pictures:










[center][size=25pt]
Vyre 728![/size][/center]

My last server got closed down because it started to die out… And i thought i would quit RSPS for a while…
BUT,
My old players motivated me to make server, because they had no home one…
So i made this one just for them!
We haven’t really much advertised… But there are players online AT ALL TIMES!
Also, the staff steam hasn’t been sorted out, there are none at the moment.

Read full topic
